comments.content:
just a similar one:

I know I know Adriano... ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612044030im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
That typeface _DOES_ look good, I must admit. No   
FontBook material, and I currently don't have the   
time to go deepdiving in internet-only collections.
Thanks Yves :-) Today I got my Font Book!!! It rules! Ready Steady GO!
